entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 9.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening. A few rain showers or flurries beginning after midnight then changing to snow before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
